page.title: 11SCHOOL QUESTIONNAIRE...1.
page.content: { {(1)Q:WHAT DO YOU THINK OF THE {EDUCATION ARRAN HIGH HAS TO OFFER ? } A:The variety of subjects to choose is limited but all in all it supplies a good education in the subjects it teaches. {(2)Q:DO YOU MAKE USE OF THE SCHOOL'S {FACILITIES IF SO WHAT ONES ? { }A:Yes,whenever possible such as hockey music and lunchtime activities. {(3)Q:WHAT DO YOU THINK OF THE {TEACHERS? ARE THEY HELPFUL ? { }A:Some are more a hindrance than a help but as teachers go they are great. {(4)Q:ARE YOU HAPPY AT LAMLASH SCHOOL ? { }A:Yes,there is a good friendly atmosphere and a great pupil teacher relationship.
